title: Kenya's Chinese-built railway seen opening to traffic in mid-2017
content:
Kenya set for first oil blocks exploration licence auction in 2017  Kenya (Today) - Nock has invited bids from contractors to gather comprehensive data on several shallow blocks off Lamu to help attract exploration firms ahead of the anticipated auction of exploration rights. Kenya...
